alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Logan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 9:42PM MDT until April 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Fort Collins, Briggsdale, and Sterling. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fire.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Avoid outdoor burning or any activity that may cause sparks. The strong winds will likely fuel rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Logan County; Northeast Weld County
